entry.title: Sanctuary4All Colorado(RNS) — The two are the latest beneficiaries of new Biden administration guidelines that restrain ICE from arresting...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado(RNS) — The two are the latest beneficiaries of new Biden administration guidelines that restrain ICE from arresting and deporting undocumented immigrants who do not pose a threat to public safety.

religionnews.com

Two more leave church sanctuary as immigration policies ease

(RNS) — The two are the latest beneficiaries of new Biden administration guidelines that restrain ICE from arresting and deporting undocumented immigrants who do not pose a threat to public safety.(RNS) — The two are the latest beneficiaries of new Biden administration guidelines that restrain ICE from arresting and deporting undocumented immigrants who do not pose a threat to public safety.

entry.title: Today is Jeanette’s birthday, and she’s asking folks to...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

Today is Jeanette’s birthday, and she’s asking folks to donate to @/sanctuary-4-all on Venmo to celebrate. All of the money goes toward an emergency fund that is only tapped if someone is unexpectedly detained by ICE and needs money for bond or legal representation.

Jeanette Vizguerra birthday You like Donate in my birthday 🥳 Donation birthday Vemo @sanctuary-4-all help me for continue support immigrants families

entry.title: Sanctuary4All ColoradoThe parents of 506 separated migrant children still haven't been found, however. Lawyers say the parents of 322 of...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All ColoradoThe parents of 506 separated migrant children still haven't been found, however. Lawyers say the parents of 322 of them were likely to have been deported.

nbcnews.com

Lawyers have found parents of 105 separated migrant kids in past month

The parents of 506 separated migrant children still haven't been found, however. Lawyers say the parents of 322 of them were likely to have been deported.The parents of 506 separated migrant children still haven't been found, however. Lawyers say the parents of 322 of them were likely to have been deported.

entry.title: Reminder that undocumented immigrants are still not receiving...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

Reminder that undocumented immigrants are still not receiving federal support. And if the government will not help us, we have a duty to help each other. You can support the Sanctuary4All emergency fund this week by ordering burritos at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co. Beef, vegetarian, and vegan available!

entry.title: This week we’re selling burritos & champurrado. Ingrid...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

This week we’re selling burritos & champurrado. Ingrid & Gaby are making burritos together to raise money for the emergency fund. It’s a little bit of money that we’re able to tap if anyone is unexpectedly detained or in need of immediate legal representation. The fund provides some peace of mind for everyone, because if something were to happen, there’s money to fall back on. You can support by ordering at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co.

entry.title: We are asking you to join us in this last effort to save Tien...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

We are asking you to join us in this last effort to save Tien Pham from being deported to Vietnam. Tien is being held at a staging center used by ICE in Arizona. We hope to get a large number of calls made to the ICE Detention Center in Aurora Colorado from where his case is being managed.
Please also share widely! Here's information for the call.
Call ICE: 720-873-2899 then 1
Tien Pham
Hi, my name is ____ and I represent ____ (organization, or city/county where you live).... I am calling in strong support of Tien Pham #74515548 who is in transit, while his case continues to be managed from your office. Tien Pham is a refugee from Vietnam.,who spent years in a refugee camp and resettled into San Jose, CA after fleeing his war-torn country. After working hard to be found suitable for parole, Tien was transferred your facility. We’re asking for his deportation order to be reversed and he be allowed to join his family who welcome his return.

See More

entry.title: Sanctuary4All Colorado+2Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Boulder, Colorado.Lupe is making tres leches cake this weekend! Here are a few photos...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado+2Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Boulder, Colorado.

Lupe is making tres leches cake this weekend! Here are a few photos of cakes she’s made in the past. Tres leches cake saves well since it’s so moist—don’t be af...raid to order even if you'll be enjoying it solo. It also freezes beautifully. Orders are open at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co
